subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Using a zone defense, the Friars held off Doug McDermott and Creighton to win the Big East title and secure their first trip to the N.C.A.A. tournament since 2004.
snippet: Using a zone defense, the Friars held off Doug McDermott and Creighton to win the Big East title and secure their first trip to the N.C.A.A. tournament since 2004.
